allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migration: Upgrade from Gemini 2.0 to 2.5 Flash with File Search Stores

- Update model from gemini-2.0-flash to gemini-2.5-flash
- Create new FileSearchStoreService for managing File Search Stores
- Refactor GeminiCorpusService to use persistent File Search Stores instead of temporary Files API
- Replace resumable upload with direct store import \(simpler API\)
- Update search queries to use the fileSearch tool configuration
- Benefits:
  * Files now persist indefinitely \(no 48-hour expiry\)
  * Automatic document chunking and embedding by Gemini
  * Free storage and query-time embeddings
  * Richer citation data with document titles and character offsets
  * Better semantic search with native File Search

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Session 39: Complete Gemini 2.5 migration with advanced features

Tasks 6-11 implementation:

6. Expanded file support \(Task 6\)
   - Added 40+ file types: CSV, XLSX, PPTX, code files \(Python, Java, C++, Go, etc.\)
   - Increased file size limit from 50MB to 100MB
   - Updated MIME type mappings for all new formats

7. Metadata filtering \(Task 7\)
   - Added metadata support to file uploads
   - Implemented AIP-160 filter syntax for document queries
   - buildMetadataFilterSpec\(\) for flexible filtering
   - Support for project, version, department tags on documents

8. Improved citations \(Task 8\)
   - Created Citation class with detailed citation tracking
   - Added character offsets \(startIndex, endIndex\) from source
   - Enhanced SearchResult to support both simple and detailed citations
   - Fallback for backwards compatibility with string citations

9. Storage tier management \(Task 9\)
   - Created StorageTier enum \(Free/Tier1/Tier2/Tier3\)
   - Implemented StorageManager for quota tracking
   - Auto-upgrade recommendations when approaching limits
   - Storage usage monitoring and alerts

10. Enhanced error handling \(Task 10\)
    - Created GeminiApiException with error categorization
    - User-friendly error messages with recovery suggestions
    - Automatic error type detection from messages
    - HTTP status code mapping to specific errors

11. Optimized file deletion \(Task 11\)
    - Added documentId caching to FileInfo for O\(1\) deletion
    - Eliminated need to list all documents for each deletion
    - Graceful handling of already-deleted documents
    - Efficient storage quota updates on deletion

All compilation errors resolved. Project builds successfully.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
